abstract: Texas is providing hard-to-obtain lethal drug pentobarbital to Virginia for upcoming execution; drug's availability is cited by lawyers for Oklahoma death row inmate Richard Glossip, who are challenging use of less reliable alternative drug state plans to use.
lead_paragraph: Virginia prison officials said they needed pentobarbital to replace a dose of another drug they intended to use, midazolam, that will soon expire.

headline.main: Texas Prison Officials Send Virginia Sought-After Drug for Execution This Week
headline.print_headline: Texas Prison Officials Send Virginia Sought-After Drug for Execution This Week

snippet: Virginia prison officials said they needed pentobarbital to replace a dose of another drug they intended to use, midazolam, that will soon expire.
